newsitem.title: PHILIPPINES: Belgian packaging firm eyes Manila as regional hub.
newsitem.headline: Belgian packaging firm eyes Manila as regional hub.

text.p: Belgian firm Vitalo Packaging International Group said on Monday it was planning to make the Philippines its Asian regional hub.

Jan Brackx, operations manager of Vitalo Packaging International Inc, said the plan will depend on how its initial investment in Laguna science park, just south of Manila, will perform in the coming years.
The 130-million peso plant will initially manufacture packaging products for semiconductor firms. Eventually, the plant will also produce packaging products for electronics and consumer products.
Vitalo said it chose Philippines as the site for its Asian manufacturing facility because of its skilled workers.
